sex.Description: self-rated by participant, M for male/F for female

group.Description: all the sujbects are on control group

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

education_years.Description: years of education calculated as formal education of 6 months or more. starts from the first year of primary/elementary school onwards

education_specify.Description: the highest level of formal education completed (i.e., does not include uncompleted education or education currently undertaken)

visual_impairment.Description: any kind of vision impairment including wearing reading glasses

mental_illness_history.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

mental_illness_specify.Description: diagnosis or treatment of whether the person has received a diagnosis for any Axis I psychiatric condition

mental_illness_family_history.Description: self-report of whether the person has a family member who has had a current or past Axis I psychiatric condition

mental_illness_family_history_specify.Description: diagnosis or treatment of the family memberâ€™s  psychiatric condition

dementia_suspec_dx_family.Description: Whether a family member had suspected or diagnosed dementia

neurological.Description: Whether the person has a current or previous neurological condition

cardiovascular.Description: Whether the person has a current or previous cardiovascular condition

diabetes.Description: Whether the person has a current or previous diabetes diagnosis

regular_medication.Description: Whether the person is currently taking regular medication

medication_last24hr.Description: Whether the person took medication in the previous 24hrs

alcohol_drinking_days.Description: number of days per week/month the person drinks

alcohol_days_per_week.Description: number of days per week the person drinks

standard_drinks_per_drinking_day.Description: number average number of standard drinks per drinking day

recreational_drugs.Description: used recreational drugs in last 6 months

recreational_drugs_specify.Description: description of recreational drugs used in last 6 months

cesd_r.Description: Centre for Epidemiological Studies Depression Inventory - Revised total score
